name: whois_query
description: Look up domain registration information using the WHOIS protocol. Returns details about domain ownership, registration dates, nameservers, and contact information.

domain_name.description: The domain name to query. Must be a valid domain format without protocol or paths. Examples: 'google.com', 'example.org', 'subdomain.example.net'. Do not include 'https://' or 'www.' prefixes unless they are part of the actual domain name.

query_type.description: Type of WHOIS information to retrieve. Options: 'full' (complete WHOIS record), 'summary' (key details only), 'availability' (check if domain is available for registration).
